alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Essex, north central Addison, southern Chittenden and western Washington Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Charlotte, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Isolated flooding in poor drainage areas and ponding on roadways is possible. Locations impacted include... South Burlington, Charlotte, Monkton Ridge, Williston, Bolton, Richmond, Mt. Philo State Park, Jericho, Hinesburg, St. George, Huntington, Kingsland Bay State Park, Jericho Village, Shelburne, Duxbury, Essex Junction Village, Monkton, Ferrisburgh, Essex, and Starksboro. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 70 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
